participant_1.name: Emma Johnson
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, Emma finds joy in simple pleasures. She has a warm and inviting demeanor, often making those around her feel at ease.
participant_1.background: i love to bake cookies. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i'm scared of dying. i've a dogs.

participant_2.name: Liam Thompson
participant_2.personality: A thoughtful and introspective individual, Liam enjoys deep conversations and has a creative flair. He approaches life with curiosity and a sense of adventure.
participant_2.background: i'm a huge star wars fan. i try various coffees as a hobby. i enjoy poetry. i played football for a division a college.

content.text: i am retired but i love baking cookies for the bake sale   you
